item.title: Spark Research is a strategic market research consultancy, founded by Cristín Mann in 2014, after 17 years in consumer research and consulting.
item.description:
Spark Research is a strategic market research consultancy, founded by Cristín Mann in 2014, after 17 years in consumer research and consulting. 

We aim to provide that vital spark of insight that ignites better marketing and commercial decision making in our clients’ businesses.

item.title: CATEGORY
item.description:
CATEGORY

Category development work is often the start point of an innovation process and is an area that we thoroughly enjoy – there is always something new to learn and new opportunity spaces to find, as well as threats to mitigate.

item.title: BRAND
item.description:
BRAND

We take a holistic view of brand development work, believing that linking what people do with what they say they do / think / feel is critical to gaining an accurate view of opportunities and threats for your brand.

item.title: INNOVATION
item.description:
INNOVATION

We have an intuitive and rigorous understanding of what is required for innovation success and take accountability not just for measuring how good an idea is, but for helping our clients improve their idea over time.  And whilst a successful end launch makes our spines tingle, we are just as passionate about making sure innovations that are not ‘right’ or not ‘ready’ don’t go to market.

item.title: SHOPPER
item.description:
SHOPPER

We can help you understand all aspects of shopper behaviour, from what prompts people to go shopping in the first place and who does this, to retailer choice, in-store navigation and category interaction, to purchasing influences at the shelf itself.  Answering key questions such as:

item.title: The Spark Ethos
item.description:
The Spark Ethos

Regardless of how Spark engages on a given research or insight requirement, our end goal is always the same:
